name: RunForLove
description:
Hello everyone!

In  this game you must run, run and run in order to escape from forest and to be at home with your lovely wife.
So this game is completed for the second BrackeysGameJam.
To create this game I used:
Unity 2018.2
Photoshop CC
Magix Music Maker
MonoDevelop

End of that, thanks for checking and I will see you in the next jams!! :)
